channel.title: software on Arun Mathai
channel.description: Recent content in software on Arun Mathai

item.title: There really exists no software
item.description: When I was a small child I used to wonder how computer storage worked and like how I used to click on the delete button and the computer would delete the files magically for me. I always compared a computer to an actual human and the fact that you could delete files on demand got me crazy cause as a human I could never do that and neither can i do it now.
